title: LAIR / Door to Stairwell
description: This prevents the player from leaving the main lair -- only fires if they have dealt with Ruby but not read her journal.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant clears his throat. "..."
dialogueTree.text: The lieutenant clears his throat. "Detective -- aren't you forgetting something?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still have to deal with her..."..."
links.text: "We still have to deal with her..." He adjusts his coat. "Not pleasant, I know. But we can't leave her like that. And we have to investigate the scene, too."

links.title: You: ""But it's so sad, Kim. Too sad for..."
links.text: "But it's so sad, Kim. Too sad for me!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be that as it may, it doesn't chan..."
links.text: "Be that as it may, it doesn't change the fact. We have a duty to her. Let's see it through." He gestures back toward the tunnels. "After you."

links.title: You: ""I'd rather go outside and have a b..."
links.text: "I'd rather go outside and have a beer right now."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, you're right. Let's get it o..."
links.text: "Yeah, you're right. Let's get it over with."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He gestures back toward the tunnels..."
links.text: He gestures back toward the tunnels. "After you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her journal? We should probably le..."
links.text: "Her journal? We should probably leaf through it. Might learn something useful."

links.title: You: ""Of course. I was just testing you,..."
links.text: "Of course. I was just testing you, to see if *you* remembered."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant only shakes his head..."
links.text: The lieutenant only shakes his head. "Let's just do it, shall we?"

links.title: You: ""Aw, can't you do it Kim? I'm wiped..."
links.text: "Aw, can't you do it Kim? I'm wiped out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still need to investigate the s..."
links.text: "We still need to investigate the scene. Remember?"
